titleStmt.title: The Case of Thomas Eyre of Hassop in the county of Derby, Esq., William Inge Esq., and divers other free-holders and inhabitants of the towns of Hope, Bradwall, and Wormhill, in the county of Derby appellants from a decree lately made against them in the court of the dutchy of Lancaster, at the suit of Thomas Eyre of Gray's Inn, Esq., and other relators.

The Case of Thomas Eyre of Hassop in the county of Derby, Esq., William Inge Esq., and divers other free-holders and inhabitants of the towns of Hope, Bradwall, and Wormhill, in the county of Derby appellants from a decree lately made against them in the court of the dutchy of Lancaster, at the suit of Thomas Eyre of Gray's Inn, Esq., and other relators.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
